Title: Prohibits hospitals and health care providers from storing credit card information without consent
Summary: Prohibits hospitals and health care providers from storing credit card information without signed written consent and requires disclosure if such information could be used to pay balances.
LawCode: Amd ยง519-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting hospitals and health care providers from storing credit card information without consent
